website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and affordable, but very compact. Great if you only want a small bat house, but many customers prefer something larger.
pros: Very well constructed and set to stand the test of time
Made from pine, which bats prefer to cedar
Comes with thorough placement and installation instructions
cons: Has screening inside for bats to cling onto, which is inferior to grooved wood

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't want a bat house, but I want the bat off my front porch. I don't know how to let the bat know that we bought it a new house and need it to move! So far, still have bat poop in front of my door and an empty bat house. If my bat relocates, it will instantly become my favorite birthday gift ever. Guess I could give it 5 stars, it was a great value for the money, I did not want a huge bat house that cost mega $$$ like many of the others - my husband said it went up easily, but I really do not know if it works yet.
customer_reviews.author: mjk

customer_reviews.title: Bat house was very educational to the class
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter wrote a report on Bats and she brought in your bat house to explain to the class how we can all help the declining bat population by putting a bat house in our back yard. She gave the class lots of information as well on the life of a bat. It turned out very well especially when all of the children were able to come up and have a hands on experience with the bat house. Made all the information come to life. We love the bat house and will be putting it up in our yard as soon as the weather permits. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Still in good condition
customer_reviews.text: The bat house is cute and after several years of hanging on a pine tree in the back yard, it still is in great shape. Unfortunately it has no occupants and never has, although it faces a retention pond/swamp area with plenty of food for an army of bats. I will keep hoping for an occupant or two.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like picture, will hold a few bats ( maybe 10 comfortably) so if need more room order bigger. Had leftover shingle to put on the roof to absorb heat, put in tree 12ft high facing south. Only had up a few days so no action yet. Trying to keep a few bats we have flying around out of our eave. Made of sturdy wood, simple constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Wanetadrift

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: The house looks like it will be great for bats. I just need to get my Dad to put it up. It came with instructions as to where to hang it, which direction for it to face and instructions on how to not bother the bats after they find the house. If I should need another, I will buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Karolkaye

customer_reviews.title: We love our bats
customer_reviews.text: we have a colony of bats here already so these hopefully will get a family. Instruction say hang in full sun, not going to hang on building so we are still looking for the proper tree to hang at 15'.
customer_reviews.author: Jetclectic

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: Is as described. Appears to be good quality. No bats yet, but it may need to be relocated to a better spot.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very well built for the money
customer_reviews.text: Item came with good instructions and information about bats. We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Had it perched and ready to move in within minutes - great service!
customer_reviews.text: If I could lose a few pounds I'd move in Myself! Had it perched and ready to move in within minutes - great service!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: NO Bats yet
customer_reviews.text: So far, only wasps are living in it, so I am disappointed. Nicely built though.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made bat house
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made bat house. Would by again. Neighbors said they say bats in the area so I put up the bat house, but haven't seen any using it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of Mexican free-tail bats in my neighborhood ...
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of Mexican free-tail bats in my neighborhood. I followed all the recommendations. After a year, still no bats in the bat house.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: well-built bat house
customer_reviews.text: The bat house is well-built and sturdy. We put it up in a tree near our house a few months ago. It's holding up well in the Florida weather, but I don't know if we have bats yet. It's easy to hang and mount. We'll see if bats come.
customer_reviews.author: rcragun

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This box looks great, is SUPER EASY to install, and hopefully (just put it up) will be home to some bats for years to come. Bye bye mosquitos!
customer_reviews.author: Willie P

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bat house
customer_reviews.text: Adorable bat house. Made with pine as opposed to cedar which makes bats happy. Arrived in perfect condition with an excellent hanger and tons of helpful information. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jessica drosin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made-- no bats yet but they say it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made-- no bats yet but they say it takes a while. Good instructions. Excellent price for a well-made house
customer_reviews.author: St. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great bat house
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Waiting for bats to home it. These mosquitoes must need eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn's corner

customer_reviews.title: Coverside Mini-bat House
customer_reviews.text: The bat house is a gift for my son. I think the bat house will be just what they need for their back yard. However, I feel it could be packaged much better for shipping. The box was crushed and had a hole in it. The bat house itself was wrapped in thin brown paper. I am happy with the bat house, but very unhappy with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: bat house
customer_reviews.text: a bit smaller than expected & glad I read the customer review to mount it on a secure hook, not a nail, in windy areas like ours!
customer_reviews.author: Mainebred

customer_reviews.title: Bat house
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bat house. Will be ordering some more to put up around my yard. Very well built. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Came completely intact
customer_reviews.text: came put together with instructions on the best locations to place the house - we just had to hang it up! ... just waiting on the bats now... :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very "mini" Been up a yr and no sign of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very "mini" Been up a yr and no sign of any bats.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: This bathouse is exactly as shown in the photograph. I'm not sure what kind of wood it is made of, but it smells very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Spal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Loved the little information paper that came with the house, cannot wait till we have a colony move in our yard!
customer_reviews.author: KK McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Mini-Bat House
customer_reviews.text: The cost and tedious specications to build a mini-bat house was more than I wanted to invest. This is easy to install and reasonably priced (compared to building your own) but there is a caveat, which is why I rated it 4-stars instead of 5. The caveat is the nature of bats: most of the time, you have to physically install a bat in a new bat house before the bat will return to it. I'm working on that end.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Except I expected to put it together and it was already made. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: VB+6

customer_reviews.title: Bats are good
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, informative info on bats and where to hang the unit made for fun project with my kids. Just waiting on new occupant to set up residency!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Corbett

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and a good quality product that came with a helpful information packet, now I'm just waiting for bats.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin St. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: no bats yet but instructions say it could take up to a year
customer_reviews.author: Justine Yula

customer_reviews.title: Bat-chelor pad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my son's Eagle Scout project. They arrived promptly and exactly as described. We're hoping they have inhabitants soon to help control mosquitos around a day car center.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Bat house
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor recommend the bat house to control flies and mosquitoes down here in south Texas, No bats yet haft to put in a water source next.
customer_reviews.author: David Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a bat house. I don't mind bats (they are good to have around) but I don't want them flying around in my house. This bat house is very well made and the instructions are clear as to what to do, not what to do and where to place it. I hope some take up residency in mine.
customer_reviews.author: Deaver Fan

customer_reviews.title: can't find a good shady solid place to mount it so it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Part of my rating is my fault.. can't find a good shady solid place to mount it so it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E Edwards

product_meta.title: Coveside Mini Wooden Bat Box House Shelter - Houses up to 12 bats
product_meta.description: A Bat house is a natural way to get rid of pesky mosquitoes and other bothersome bugs - bats eat their weight in insects in one night! No chemicals or noisy bug zappers necessary. Dimensions: Height: 12.5in - Length: 7.25in - Width: 3.75in - Weight: 2.5lbs
feature_bullets: Sustainably grown 1" thick Eastern White Pine provides superior insullation.
Hand crafted in Maine. Warranty: One year.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
